EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-06-21
EmailTemplate.subject: Dear Graduates, You’re Not “Junior Developers”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JuNE 21, 2018 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/dear-graduates-youre-not-junior-developers-53b80e020713?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-iink&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Dear Graduates, You’re Not “Junior Developers” Josh McKenty, Vice President of Technology for Cloud Foundry, explains why new graduates shouldn't think of themselves as junior developers. Think of yourself as an apprentice <[[https://builttoadapt.io/dear-graduates-youre-not-junior-developers-53b80e020713?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-iink&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hybrid-cloud-demands-consistency-forrester?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Hybrid Cloud Demands Consistency We've teamed up with Microsoft to bring you this Forrester report on the state of the hybrid cloud, concerns with using multiple cloud platforms, and more. Get the Report Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hybrid-cloud-demands-consistency-forrester?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/whats-the-best-way-to-pair-a8699f9beb81?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> What’s the Best Way to Pair? Maya Rosecrance, Software Engineer at Pivotal London and Sarah Connor, Software Engineer at Pivotal London try to figure out the best way to approach pair programming. Pomodoro, Ping-Pong or Pair-mate? <[[https://builttoadapt.io/whats-the-best-way-to-pair-a8699f9beb81?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/solving-the-conundrum-of-containers-and-databases-ep-72?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Solving the Conundrum of Containers and Databases (Ep. 72) In this episode of Pivotal Insights, SnappyData's Jags Ramnarayan joins Jeff and Dormain to talk through the promise and perils of containerized databases. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/solving-the-conundrum-of-containers-and-databases-ep-72?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/mysql-for-pcf-v2-3-protects-your-data-with-tls-adds-synchronous-replication-for-leader-follower?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> MySQL for PCF v2.3 Protects Your Data with TLS, Adds Synchronous Replication for Leader-Follower MySQL 2.3 for PCF aims to ease the pain associated with microservices database management. Learn what it can do for you. Take a Deeper Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/mysql-for-pcf-v2-3-protects-your-data-with-tls-adds-synchronous-replication-for-leader-follower?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/making-sense-of-text-analytics-with-pivotal-greenplum-and-the-new-gptext?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Making Sense of Text Analytics with Pivotal Greenplum and the New GPText 3.0 Having trouble unlocking the value of your text data? Learn why the new GPText 3.0 is the answer. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/making-sense-of-text-analytics-with-pivotal-greenplum-and-the-new-gptext?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/cache-rules-everything-around-me-when-to-use-redis-and-when-to-use-pivotal-cloud-cache?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> When to Use Redis and When to Use Pivotal Cloud Cache Jag Mirani breaks down when to use Redis and when Pivotal Cloud Cache is the better pick. Cache Rules Everything Around Me <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/cache-rules-everything-around-me-when-to-use-redis-and-when-to-use-pivotal-cloud-cache?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 6/26 Paris Container Day, Paris <[[https://paris-container-day.fr/]]>
6/25-6/27 Pivotal Cloud Foundry Developer Training Course, Melbourne <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1092?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
6/27, Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.2: Accelerating Development, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jun-27-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-2-accelerating-development-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
